features: WHAT'S INCLUDED: (1) Powered Handle, (1) Multi-Purpose Head, (4) AA batteries
INTENSE CLEANING POWER: Handheld powerful oscillating head scrubs 60 times per second, quickly and effectively removing everyday grime and restoring surfaces
SAVE TIME AND ENERGY: Designed to scrub up to 2x faster than manual scrubbing, reducing strain and giving you back time in your day
WATER RESISTANT PERFORMANCE: Robust water resistance for reliability in any cleaning situation
INDUSTRY-LEADING QUALITY: Rubbermaid is committed to delivering long-lasting, dependable products that help simplify everyday tasks
HOME CLEANING ESSENTIAL: Perfect for tight spaces around the house; faucets, drains, sink, tile, and grout for the bathroom and appliances, counters, stove-tops, and microwaves in the kitchen
TAKE THE CLEAN OUTDOORS: Tackle cleaning projects outside; including the patio grill and furniture, car trim, tires, and wheels, and your golf clubs and balls
KEEP SHOES SPOTLESS: Polish and deep clean sneakers, shoes, and boots; keeps them lasting longer and looking like new
body.description: The Rubbermaid Reveal Power Scrubber adds power to your cleaning routine. With an oscillating head that scrubs 60 times per second, the Rubbermaid Power Scrubber cleans up to 2X faster than manual scrubbing! Great for cleaning the bathroom, kitchen or any other hard-to-reach places. The assembly is water resistant so you can depend on the tool even if it gets wet. The switch gives you the ability to switch between a pulse or continuous setting. The Power Scrubber has an ergonomic grip and rubberized molding for comfortable cleaning and delivers 6 Volts of power.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multitudes of Everyday Use Cases Handheld powerful oscillating head scrubs 60 times per second, quickly and effectively removing everyday grime and restoring surfaces. Perfect for tight spaces around the house; faucets, drains, sink, tile, and grout for the bathroom and appliances, counters, stove-tops, and microwaves in the kitchen. Polish and deep clean sneakers, shoes, and boots; keeps them lasting longer and looking like new. Tackle cleaning projects outside; including the patio grill and furniture, car trim, tires, and wheels, and your golf clubs and balls.

Designed to scrub up to 2x faster than manual scrubbing, reducing strain and giving you back time in your day. Rubbermaid is committed to delivering long-lasting, dependable products that help simplify everyday tasks. Many different brush head options to tackle any cleaning task that comes up. Robust water resistance for reliability in any cleaning situation.

Power Scrubber 18-Piece Ultimate Kit Power Scrubber 2-Piece Combo Kit Power Scrubber Grout Head Dual Scrubber Head Combo 8-Piece Polish Kit Product Description Tackle any cleaning job that comes your way with a variety of brush and scrub head types Perfect for standard scrubbing and tight spaces with the additional pointed Grout head Standalone power scrubber gets the job done with additional heads available for special jobs Grout head lets the scrubber get deep into recessed grout lines and tight corners Deep scrub everything from dishes to shower glass with two additional oversized heads Polish the finer things in your home like dishes, silverware, and sneakers with these polish heads

Reveal Microfiber Spray Mop Self-Wringing Twist Mop Flat Spin Mop & Bucket Tandem Mop Bucket & Wringer Roughneck Cleaning Bucket Microfiber Cleaning Cloth Pack Product Description Washable microfiber pads and on-board sprayable cleaning solution with the all-in-one Reveal Spray Mop Deep clean your floors with deep cleaning scrub stripes and no need for a mop bucket wringer with the built-in system Avoid the mess with the built-in wringer system in the Flat Spin Mop Bucket Work like the pros do with the tandem mop bucket & wringer, perfect for any mopping solution needed General purpose cleaning bucket, perfect for pairing with the Twist Mop, or washing the car Microfiber material grabs fine dust and particles, and is also washable for repeated use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really works well!
reviews.reviewText: I am always skeptical of the products that have so many reviews and that are hyped up on social media. However I was very surprised how well this works. I have arthritis in my fingers and it is difficult for me to scrub crevices and to do a lot of housework but this took is saving my hands! It is really powerful and really digs into small areas like between faucet handles and the sink drain holes. I am actually going to buy more of them so that I can use it in kitchen and the bathroom. I even tried to use it on the soles and edges of my white Nike Air Force Ones and it was so easy to clean them!A downside of this product is it's very noisy considering how small it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very strong and easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: I love this tool. For my cleaning business it really can get in the small spaces. I originally used it on shower walls for grime and it worked for grout, but now I use it on toilets around small screws and stuff that can’t get cleaned with just a rag. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use & sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Love the product so far cuts down the cleaning time on hard to reach places, just wish it was also USB enabled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am not that person who overly enjoys cleaning my bathroom, but when I turned on this scrubber and started using it on my grout (spraying with a cleaner first) I thought... wait! Are my eyes deceiving me or is this thing truly getting some stuff off the grout that I've never accomplished on my own? So I was kind of fascinated, and kept scrubbing away at different areas. Sure enough, this gadget did a good job.I would not say this is a miracle worker, since there are a few areas I will need to go back over to get that cleaner look. However, that is to be expected and not unreasonable. This scrubber does exactly as advertised on the package- faster scrubbing, less elbow grease on my part, and gets in those corners and crevices. Plus, it came with batteries and I was able to turn it on immediately. For the price, it's a win and I do recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great For Cleaning Everything, Including your Face
reviews.reviewText: I bought this brush to clean our shower, which has some rather detailed marble work that can collect "gunk" if you don't stay on top of it. If I notice the beginnings of mildew or soap scum while I'm in there, I fire this bad boy up and take care of it.It does a great job of getting into the corners of the tile, and around the details that my fat fingers can't clean with a regular rag.Now, for many years, we have also kept in the shower a Clarisonic face washer. It's a similar, though much higher priced, twirling brush that blasts the dirt from your pores. But about a month ago, the Clarisonic died. A few weeks after it went in the bin, my darling came downstairs, shower fresh and asked "What's happened to the BIG face scrubber?"I knew where this was heading."Do you think there's a SMALL face scrubber?" I asked."Yes, but I prefer the big one. The red one takes forever to wash your face with."I double over laughing, but Darling's pores have never been cleaner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good to scrub little creases
reviews.reviewText: I use this to scrub the creases in my kitchen table. It has a good amount of power and tough bristles that will bend and soften with water to prevent scratching material. Highly recommend. I use this item often and have yet needed to replace batteries

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't do anything a toothbrush can do. Seems like an expensive excuse to buy batteries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to clean in the tight places on our floor fan cover and around the faucets however..... it works awesome on my front load washer in the softener area. This area sometimes gets gummy and has to be cleaned with a toothbrush and a toothpick . This handy tool did the job great!
The media could not be loaded. This is awesome for all those hard to scrub places. Battery lasts a long time and the speed is perfect for getting off the soap scum but not damaging any surfaces

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 29, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This alone does nothing. You have to buy lots of extra attachments to do the jobs the advert describes. Very expensive on its own and does nothing.
This was exactly what I needed to get my shower looking brand new again. So easy to use and saved a lot of elbow grease and sore hands
Cleaning result is not as expected
